technology_names_embarksailing.Thai: การล่องเรือ

unit_abilities_staticplus.Thai: อยู่กับที่

tooltip_ability_staticplus.English: This unit cannot become a veteran.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Portuguese (Brazil): Esta unidade não pode se tornar veterana.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Russian: Этот отряд не может получить звание ветерана.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Italian (Italy): Questa unità non può diventare un veterano.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.French (France): Cette unité ne peut pas devenir vétéran.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Spanish (Mexico): Esta unidad no puede ser veterana.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.German (Germany): Diese Einheit kann kein Veteran werden.
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Japanese: このユニットはベテランになれない
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Korean: 이 유닛은 베테랑이 될 수 없습니다
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Hindi: यह यूनिट वेटरन नहीं बन सकती है
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Indonesian: Unit ini tidak bisa menjadi veteran
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Malay: Unit ini tidak boleh menjadi veteran
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Polish: Ta jednostka nie może zostać weteranem
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Thai: ยูนิตนี้ไม่สามารถเป็นทหารผ่านศึกได้
tooltip_ability_staticplus.Vietnamese: Đơn vị này không thể trở thành cựu binh

tooltip_ability_skate.English: This unit has difficulty moving and cannot use its abilities when on the field.
tooltip_ability_skate.Russian: Этот отряд с трудом передвигается и не может использовать свои способности когда находится на поле.

tooltip_ability_skate__magma.English: This unit has difficulty moving and cannot use its abilities when on the field.
tooltip_ability_skate__magma.Russian: Этот отряд с трудом передвигается и не может использовать свои способности когда находится на поле.

tooltip_ability_slide.English: This unit gets an extra move when moving on ice.
tooltip_ability_slide.Russian: Этот отряд получает одно дополнительное передвижение на льду.

tooltip_ability_slide__magma.English: This unit gets an extra move when moving on lava.
tooltip_ability_slide__magma.Russian: Этот отряд получает одно дополнительное передвижение на лаве.

tooltip_ability_glide.English: All non-skating and non-sliding units get an extra move when moving on ice.
tooltip_ability_glide.Russian: Все отряды которые не могут скользить и не имеют коньков получат одно дополнительное передвижение на льду.

tooltip_ability_glide__magma.English: All non-rolling and non-sliding units get an extra move when moving on lava.
tooltip_ability_glide__magma.Russian: Все отряды которые не могут скользить и не катаются получат одно дополнительное передвижение на лаве.

tooltip_ability_waterembark.English: Allows land units to move on water and to turn into boats.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Portuguese (Brazil): Permite que unidades terrestres se movam na água e se transformem em barcos.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Russian: Позволяет сухопутным отрядам двигатся на воду и превращатся в лодки.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Italian (Italy): Permette alle unità terrestri di muoversi sull'acqua e trasformarsi in barche.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.French (France): Permet aux unités terrestres de se déplacer sur l'eau et de se transformer en bateaux.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Spanish (Mexico): Permite que las unidades terrestres se muevan en el agua y se conviertan en barcos.

building_ability_halved.English: Level of this building is halved and rounded down.
building_ability_halved.Russian: Уровень этого здания уменьшен вдвое и округлен в меньшую сторону.

tooltip_ability_embassy.English: Allow construction of Embassies in foreign capitals. Embassies provide income for both parties as long as they are not at war.

diplomacy_establishedembassy_description.English: You have established an embassy in the {0} capital. It will give you both {1} stars per turn.
{0} established an embassy in your capital. It will give you both {1} stars per turn.

technology_names_embarquatism.Thai: วิถีแห่งสายน้ำ

tooltip_ability_dashembark.English: Allows units immidiately move and attack after embarking.
tooltip_ability_dashembark.Russian: Позволяет отрядам моментально двигаться и атаковать после спуска на воду.

tooltip_tile_riot.English: There are riots in this city!

world_rebellion_description.English: {0} from the {1} tribe has infiltrated the city of {2} and incited a revolt against you!

technology_defence_info.English: gives your units with Fortify ability extra strength when defending in {0}

technology_defence_info.Italian (Italy): dona forza extra alla tua unità quando difende in: {0}
technology_defence_info.French (France): renforce votre unité lorsqu’elle défend dans : {0}
technology_defence_info.Spanish (Mexico): le da más fuerza a tu soldado cuando se defiende en {0}
technology_defence_info.German (Germany): gibt deiner Einheit zusätzliche Stärke beim Verteidigen in: {0}
technology_defence_info.Japanese: {0} での防御時にユニットの力が上昇します
technology_defence_info.Korean: {0}에서 방어할 때 당신의 유닛에게 더 큰 힘을 제공합니다
technology_defence_info.Hindi: {0} की रक्षा करते हुए आपकी यूनिट को अतिरिक्त ताकत देती है
technology_defence_info.Indonesian: memberi kekuatan ekstra kepada unitmu saat bertahan di {0}
technology_defence_info.Malay: memberi unit anda kekuatan tambahan apabila mempertahankan dalam {0}
technology_defence_info.Polish: zapewnia twojej jednostce dodatkową siłę podczas obrony na terenie typu „{0}”
technology_defence_info.Thai: มอบความแข็งแกร่งเพิ่มเติมให้กับยูนิต ในขณะที่ป้องกันอยู่ใน {0}
technology_defence_info.Turkish: birimine {0} savunması sırasında ek güç verir
